briefdescription.para: A regular polygon can be constructed inscribed in a circle or circumscribed about a circle.
Constructor for QgsRegularPolygon.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsPoint &center, double radius, double azimuth, unsigned int numberSides, ConstructionOption circle)
memberdef.name: QgsRegularPolygon

briefdescription.para: Constructs a regular polygon by center and parameters for the first vertex.

detaileddescription.para:
An empty regular polygon is returned if numberSides < 3 or ConstructionOption isn't valid.
center
The center of the regular polygon.
radius
Distance from the center and the first vertex or sides (see ConstructionOption).
azimuth
Angle in degrees started from the North to the first vertex.
numberSides
Number of sides of the regular polygon.
circle
Option to create the polygon.
ConstructionOption

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsPoint &center, const QgsPoint &pt1, unsigned int numberSides, ConstructionOption circle)
memberdef.name: QgsRegularPolygon

briefdescription.para: Constructs a regular polygon by center and another point.

parameterdescription.para: The center of the regular polygon.
The first vertex if the polygon is inscribed in circle or the midpoint of a side if the polygon is circumscribed about circle.
Number of sides of the regular polygon.

Option to create the polygon inscribed in circle (the radius is the distance between the center and vertices) or circumscribed about circle (the radius is the distance from the center to the midpoints of the sides).

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsPoint &pt1, const QgsPoint &pt2, unsigned int numberSides)
memberdef.name: QgsRegularPolygon

briefdescription.para: Constructs a regular polygon by two points of the first side.

parameterdescription.para: The first vertex of the first side, also first vertex of the regular polygon.
The second vertex of the first side.
Number of sides of the regular polygon.

briefdescription.para: Returns the apothem of the regular polygon.

detaileddescription.para:
The apothem is the radius of the inscribed circle.
radius()

briefdescription.para: Returns the area.

detaileddescription.para: Returns 0 if the regular polygon is empty.

briefdescription.para: Returns the center point of the regular polygon.
Returns the measure of the central angle (the angle subtended at the center of the polygon by one of its sides) in degrees.
Returns the circumscribed circle.
Returns the first vertex (corner) of the regular polygon.
Returns the inscribed circle.
Returns the measure of the interior angles in degrees.
A regular polygon is empty if radius equal to 0 or number of sides < 3.
Returns the length of a side.

detaileddescription.para: Returns 0 if the regular polygon is empty.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of sides of the regular polygon.
Returns the perimeter.

detaileddescription.para: Returns 0 if the regular polygon is empty.

briefdescription.para: Returns a list including the vertices of the regular polygon.
Returns the radius.

detaileddescription.para:
This is also the radius of the circumscribing circle.
apothem()
setRadius()

briefdescription.para: Sets the center point.

detaileddescription.para:
Radius is unchanged. The first vertex is reprojected from the new center.
center()

briefdescription.para: Sets the first vertex.

detaileddescription.para:
Radius is unchanged. The center is reprojected from the new first vertex.
firstVertex()

briefdescription.para: Sets the number of sides.

detaileddescription.para:
If numberSides < 3, the number of sides is unchanged.
numberSides()

briefdescription.para: Sets the radius.

detaileddescription.para:
Center is unchanged. The first vertex is reprojected from the center with the new radius.
radius()

briefdescription.para: Returns as a linestring.
Returns as a polygon.

memberdef.argsstring: (int pointPrecision=17, int radiusPrecision=17, int anglePrecision=2) const
memberdef.name: toString

briefdescription.para: Returns a string representation of the regular polygon.

detaileddescription.para: Members will be truncated to the specified precision.

briefdescription.para: Returns as a triangle.

detaileddescription.para: An empty triangle is returned if the regular polygon is empty or if the number of sides is different from 3.

briefdescription.para: Returns a triangulation (vertices from sides to the center) of the regular polygon.

detaileddescription.para: An empty list is returned if the regular polygon is empty.

briefdescription.para: Convenient method to convert an apothem to a radius.
Convenient method for centralAngle used by constructors.
Convenient method for interiorAngle used by constructors.
Regular Polygon geometry type.

detaileddescription.para: A regular polygon is a polygon that is equiangular (all angles are equal in measure) and equilateral (all sides have the same length). The regular polygon is defined by a center point with a number of sides/vertices, a radius and the first vertex.
